about_the_game:
The Mystery of Memory

  • In a world where chaos and void are intertwined, you awaken from endless darkness, finding yourself in a chaotic world. This place is the haven for forgotten souls, those unable to transcend, wandering here forever unable to be freed. Your memory is fragmented, the only thing you can rely on are the memory fragments scattered throughout this world. These fragments are like guiding beacons, gradually piecing together snippets of your past life.

Battle and Adventure

  • You vaguely recall having fallen in a fierce battle, destined to enter the cycle of reincarnation, but just before dying, you activated a mysterious reincarnation array. This array carried your soul into the chaotic world, avoiding the fate of reincarnation. You must continuously accumulate strength through adventure and battle in the chaotic world until you can activate the array again to leave this place.

Character Transformation

  • In the chaotic world, you are not alone. You will encounter some special souls, each trapped here but with their own unfinished wishes. By helping them fulfill these wishes, you can borrow their power, transforming into them to use their unique abilities.

Embark on an Unknown Journey

  • At the end of the chaotic world, truth and lies are intertwined, and the boundaries between memory and soul become blurred. Who are you? Why did you come here? What kind of existence do you truly want to be?

  • Following the 'self' that guided you in your memories, you will eventually approach the exit of the chaotic world, and your choices will determine your future.

  • All the answers lie in the last memory fragments, waiting for you to uncover.

short_description: This is a casual and lightweight 3D Roguelike game, allowing you to switch between top-down and third-person perspectives. It also features main story exploration and various mini-games.
